constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 85 (Wednesday, May 18, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. KAHELE:
H.R. 7813.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
U.S Constitution including Article 1, Section 8, Clause 1
(General Welfare Clause) and Article 1, Section 8, Clause 18
(Necessary and Proper Clause), Article 4, Section 3, Clause 2
(Property)
[Page H5174]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Biotechnology, Horticulture, and Research.

title: Cacao Tree Health Initiative Act of 2022
